summary: The customer is looking to downgrade their service with Contoso Wireless and asked what options they have for their product TV. The agent provided information on a package that includes 60 channels of basic cable and no sports or premium channels, as well as an additional discount if the customer bundles it with another one of Contoso Wireless's services, such as internet service. The agent also provided details on the internet service and its features, including up to 100Mbps download speeds and 24/7 customer support. The customer is now ready to sign up for the bundle.
